ygData.subject: Re: Level 14 mobs do drop components
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/28/99 8:40:55 AM Pacific Daylight Time, scott@speechworks.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/28/99 8:40:55 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
scott@... writes:

<<
I was on kerra isle killing wisps and an erudite madman (wizard) was
tromping about and conned yellow to me, and since I'm level 13, he's level
14. After some help and a lay on hands from a friend, we killed him. I
totally didn't expect a component cause all I read about is only on 16+,
but I got page 24 of Tarishn's Grimoire (dunno if I spelled that one right).
>>

I think that maybe the 16+ limitation means that the creature has to be able
to spawn at that level...this last weekend I got runes, words, etc. off of
14th and 15th level mobs as well as 16th...kodiaks and borer beetles...which
can both be 16th level, but I happened to get 'baby' ones on that spawn...;P

Seraphine of the CraftKeepers
